questions.question: Would you mind ………………………. me a cup of coffee?
questions.description: An ing form is used after would you mind?

questions.question: Do you mind ……………………….. overtime?
questions.description: An ing form is used after do you mind.

questions.question: I was told …………………………
questions.description: A to-infinitive is used after tell.

questions.question: The teacher encouraged the students ……………………….. harder.
questions.description: Encourage is followed by object + to-infinitive.

questions.question: It would be a mistake for you ……………………….. him.
I have never had anyone ……………………….. me.
I regret ………………………. you that your flight has been cancelled.
questions.description: Regret + infinitive is used to announce bad news.

questions.question: You should not have waited so long ………………………….. looking for another job.
He enjoys ………………………… on long drives.
questions.description: Enjoy is followed by an ing form.

questions.question: It is important ……………………………. to them.
questions.description: Important is followed by an infinitive.

questions.question: She is likely ……………………….. this evening.
questions.description: Likely is followed by a to-infinitive.
